Lobbyist Name: Ecumenical Accompaniment Programme in Palestine and Israel
Specific Details: Members presented to Irish parliamentarians and advisers in the Dáil on the violations of international law by the Israeli government, including forced displacement and violence against Palestinian civilians in the South Hebron Hills region of occupied Palestine.
DPOs Lobbied: Catherine Connolly|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas::Mairéad Farrell|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas
Subject Matter: Members presented to Irish parliamentarians and advisers in the Dáil on the violations of international law by the Israeli government, including forced displacement and violence against Palestinian civilians in the South Hebron Hills region of occupied Palestine.
Intended Results: To strengthen the response from the Irish government towards breaches of international law, particularly regarding principles of distinction and proportionality in armed conflict, illegal Israeli settlement activity, and compensation for destruction of EU/Irish Aid-funded structures. Additionally, to enact the Occupied Territories Bill, which would prohibit the import of goods produced in illegal settlements in all occupied territories.
